name: Steven Michael PODOBENSKY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of August, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
